ECSchema.description: Custom attributes used for schema localization

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Keeps the localizable values from this element from being combined with those from another element if duplication occurs. If combined a GUID is used as the key for the localizable value.

ECProperty.description: If true the elements Display Label will always be treated as a unique value.
If true the elements description will always be treated as a unique value.

ECStructClass.description: Contains a localized value and a key that identifies it. The key may be a GUID or the original value. If the value is a GUID 'IsGUID' is true.

ECCustomAttributeClass.description: Specifies the locale and an array of resources consisting of key-value pairs that contain localization data.
